oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tribute to James Monroe Brady
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This framed tribute honors James Monroe Brady, who served in the 1st Ark. Inf. Regt., CSA. It includes a photograph and articles published about his actions during the Civil War. He fought at Shiloh and was severely wounded at Franklin. His unit later joined Gen. Patrick Cleburne's 15th Ark. Inf. One article reports Confederate veteran plans to return a Union flag captured from the 76th Ohio, USA. at Ringgold Gap, Georgia, in 1863.
